derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Spanish Canibales (plural), variant (recorded by Columbus) of Caribes, the name of a West Indian people reputed to eat humans (see Carib)

entry.def: Cannibals are people who eat the flesh of other human beings.
